metadata.title: CVE-2018-18839 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in Netdata 1.10.0. Full PathDisclosure (FPD) exists via api/v1/alarms. NOTE: the vendor says "isintentional."

criterions.comment: netdata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
